Text: I can't open Riven X. I tried the installer in the ISO file, it says classic environment is no longer supported. Please help!

This is apparently just an ISO image of the Riven DVD.  Use Riven X to play on Mac OS X.

http://www.devklog.net/rivenx/
or use a nightly build of ScummVM; support for Riven in an early stage. ;)
Please seed it guys! This game is deserved to stay alive. I will join the seeding once compete the download.
